name: Aethersnipe
oracle_text:
When Aethersnipe enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Evoke {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Akroan Crusader
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Crusader, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with haste.
flavor_text: An Akroan soldier's worth is measured by the number of swords raised by his battle cry.

name: Angelic Renewal
oracle_text: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may sacrifice Angelic Renewal. If you do, return that card to the battlefield.
flavor_text: Angels watch over mortals with heavy hearts, knowing what fate awaits them in the end.

name: Archaeomancer
oracle_text: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

name: Arena Athlete
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Arena Athlete, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.
flavor_text: The Iroan Games award no medals. Athletes vie for a visit from Iroas, god of victory.

name: Basking Rootwalla
oracle_text:
{1}{G}: Basking Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
Madness {0} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Beckon Apparition
oracle_text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: The foyer is littered with the coins it demands but can no longer hold.

name: Bloodflow Connoisseur
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodflow Connoisseur.
flavor_text:
"Death not for survival but for vanity and pleasure? This is the decadence I sought to curb."
—Sorin Markov

name: Canker Abomination
oracle_text: As Canker Abomination enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Canker Abomination enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it for each creature that player controls.
flavor_text: Once the hideous disease takes hold, it spreads through both bark and mind.

name: Cathodion
oracle_text: When Cathodion dies, add {C}{C}{C}.
flavor_text: Instead of creating a tool that would be damaged by heat, the Thran built one that was charged by it.

name: Conviction
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
{W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "There is no greater coward than one who believes in nothing."

name: Crow of Dark Tidings
oracle_text:
Flying
When Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield or dies, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Crushing Canopy
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Do not mistake your lofty vantage point for safety."
—Shaper Tuvasa

name: Dark Dabbling
oracle_text:
Regenerate target creature. Draw a card. (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, also regenerate each other creature you control.

name: Death Denied
oracle_text: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Takenuma was filled with a chorus of moans, shrieks, and wails. Some came from the living, some from the dying, and some, most horribly, from the dead.

name: Defy Gravity
oracle_text:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Flashback {U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: On every plane in the Multiverse, there is magic, and someone is using it to fly.

name: Deranged Assistant
oracle_text: {T}, Mill a card: Add {C}. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: "Garl, adjust the slurry dispensers. Garl, fetch more corpses. Garl, quit crying and give me your brain tissue. If he doesn't stop being so rude, I'm quitting."

name: Dimir Guildmage
oracle_text:
({U/B} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.)
{3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
{3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Double Cleave
oracle_text: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: If at first you don't succeed, hit them again.

name: Eel Umbra
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

name: Faithless Looting
oracle_text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

name: Faith's Fetters
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

name: Fiery Temper
oracle_text:
Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to any target.
Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: "Let the flames ignore the sinless."

card_faces.name: Fire
card_faces.oracle_text: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

card_faces.name: Ice
card_faces.oracle_text:
Tap target permanent.
Draw a card.

name: Flight of Fancy
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Flight of Fancy enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Enchanted creature has flying.
flavor_text: The view from above is an inspiration to the newly winged.

name: Foil
oracle_text:
You may discard an Island card and another card rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell.
flavor_text: Among wizards, poor timing is the most consistent mistake.

name: Fume Spitter
oracle_text: Sacrifice Fume Spitter: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
"Our archers made sport of it as it fumbled its way up the slag ridge. As it collapsed we thought ourselves safe, but the foul thing carried more than necrogen."
—Adaran, Tangle hunter

name: Generator Servant
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Generator Servant: Add {C}{C}. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it gains haste until end of turn. (That creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: Infinite potential given finite form.

name: Ghoulcaller's Accomplice
oracle_text: {3}{B}, Exile Ghoulcaller's Accomplice from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "Once in the box, we're all the same."

name: Gods Willing
oracle_text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)
Scry 1.
flavor_text: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.

name: Golgari Brownscale
oracle_text:
When Golgari Brownscale is put into your hand from your graveyard, you gain 2 life.
Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, you may mill two cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Grave Scrabbler
oracle_text:
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
When Grave Scrabbler enters the battlefield, if its madness cost was paid, you may return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.

name: Groundskeeper
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Return target basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "While the church thinks in terms of legacies, others think in terms of eternities."

name: Gurmag Angler
oracle_text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
flavor_text: If everything in the Gurmag Swamp hungers for human flesh, what bait could be more effective?

name: Heliod's Pilgrim
oracle_text: When Heliod's Pilgrim enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The blessings of Heliod are apparent for all to see.

name: Hissing Iguanar
oracle_text: Whenever another creature dies, you may have Hissing Iguanar deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: It's pretty cute—from a distance.

name: Hooting Mandrills
oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Trample
flavor_text: Interlopers in Sultai territory usually end up as crocodile chow or baboon bait.

name: Hyena Umbra
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

name: Icatian Crier
oracle_text: {1}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: Create two 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens.
flavor_text: A thousand years removed from her home, her news of war had lost its context, but not its relevance.

name: Ingot Chewer
oracle_text:
When Ingot Chewer enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
flavor_text: Elementals are ideas given form. This one is the idea of "smashitude."

name: Just the Wind
oracle_text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Madness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: "There's nothing to worry about."

name: Kodama's Reach
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"The land grows only where the kami will it."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

name: Last Gasp
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Takedowns in Valor's Reach are never meant to be lethal, but that doesn't mean they won't be incredibly painful.

name: Lotus-Eye Mystics
oracle_text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Lotus-Eye Mystics enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Every action has a foreseen purpose.

name: Mad Prophet
oracle_text:
Haste
{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor_text: "I have seen it. Seen the end, seen the beginning, the beginning of the end. Not death, no, no. Transcendence!"

name: Mammoth Umbra
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has vigilance.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

name: Mark of the Vampire
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.
flavor_text:
"My 'condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it."
—Sorin Markov

name: Martyr of Sands
oracle_text: {1}, Reveal X white cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Sands: You gain three times X life.
flavor_text: "Only in our vulnerability is there true power, and that power is life itself."

name: Miming Slime
oracle_text: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
flavor_text:
"We paid the Simic very well for this capability, but we should quickly recoup our expenses in saved wages."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Moan of the Unhallowed
oracle_text:
Create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: For a ghoul, every village is a buffet and every disaster is a reunion.

name: Molten Birth
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens, then flip a coin. If you win the flip, return Molten Birth to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Few can coax the creatures within the magma to be cooled and take form."
—Koth of the Hammer

name: Myr Servitor
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Myr Servitor is on the battlefield, each player returns all cards named Myr Servitor from their graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: The Krark Clan enjoys pulling them apart just to watch them reassemble one another.

name: Nightbird's Clutches
oracle_text:
Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.
Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: Shiny polished silver can ward off many creatures, but it attracts others.

name: Offalsnout
oracle_text:
Flash
When Offalsnout leaves the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard.
Evoke {B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Olivia's Dragoon
oracle_text: Discard a card: Olivia's Dragoon gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Displays of Voldaren bloodlust are not restricted to glamorous banquets and lavish parties.

name: Patchwork Gnomes
oracle_text: Discard a card: Regenerate Patchwork Gnomes. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)
flavor_text: One wizard's trash is another wizard's roving gang of abominations.

name: Prey Upon
oracle_text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text:
"You don't find many old werewolf hunters."
—Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

name: Pulse of Murasa
oracle_text: Return target creature or land card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. You gain 6 life.
flavor_text: "Little flower twirl and bloom, arise from this your rocky tomb. Little warrior slash and brawl, be born again to free us all."

name: Raid Bombardment
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, Raid Bombardment deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.
flavor_text: Goblins in the first wave of a fire raid always bemoan the aim of everyone else.

name: Rakdos Shred-Freak
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text: "If there were such a thing as a soul, I think it would be behind the gallbladder but above the kidneys."

name: Reckless Charge
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Reckless Wurm
oracle_text:
Trample
Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: Bred for battle in the Grand Coliseum, these wurms annihilated whole ecosystems when released into the wild.

name: Repel the Darkness
oracle_text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: A boon to those who cannot see in the dark. A bane to those who live in it.

name: Resurrection
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"Think of this new life not as a gift from the angels but as a command to fight for their cause once more."
—War blessing of Serra

name: Ronom Unicorn
oracle_text: Sacrifice Ronom Unicorn: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: The aberrant magic of the Rimewind drew the unicorns back from the northern wastes to do battle once again.

name: Rune Snag
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2} plus an additional {2} for each card named Rune Snag in each graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Concentration is key. Without it, a mage conjures nothing but a splitting headache."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Safehold Elite
oracle_text: Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: Not even death will keep her from her mission.

name: Sanitarium Skeleton
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Return Sanitarium Skeleton from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: His mind was lost long before his flesh.

name: Satyr Wayfinder
oracle_text: When Satyr Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: The first satyr to wake after a revel must search for the site of the next one.

name: Scuzzback Marauders
oracle_text:
Trample
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Shed Weakness
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You may remove a -1/-1 counter from it.
flavor_text: To prepare for the Trial of Strength, nagas shed their old skin—and with it their scars, their doubts, and their fears.

name: Shielding Plax

({G/U} can be paid with either {G} or {U}.)
Enchant creature

name: Skyspear Cavalry
oracle_text:
Flying
Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: Pray her spear reaches you first. Her griffin is less kind.

name: Skywing Aven
oracle_text:
Flying
Discard a card: Return Skywing Aven to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "I am as the wind that bears me: harsh yet gentle, fleeting yet ever-present. Together we fly beyond imagination."

name: Slum Reaper
oracle_text: When Slum Reaper enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: It's sent into unguilded districts by the Orzhov to collect the souls of those no one will miss.

name: Soul's Fire
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any target.
flavor_text: An avatar he sculpts of anger and flame.

name: Sparkspitter
oracle_text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token named Spark Elemental. It has trample, haste, and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental."

name: Spider Umbra

Enchant creature

Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

name: Staunch-Hearted Warrior
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Staunch-Hearted Warrior, put two +1/+1 counters on Staunch-Hearted Warrior.
flavor_text: As soon as she faces a monster, she begins composing its epitaph.

name: Stitched Drake
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
Flying

"The best skaabs are more powerful and more beautiful than the sum of their parts."

name: Stitcher's Apprentice
oracle_text: {1}{U}, {T}: Create a 2/2 blue Homunculus creature token, then sacrifice a creature.

name: Sultai Skullkeeper
oracle_text: When Sultai Skullkeeper enters the battlefield, mill two cards.

name: Terramorphic Expanse

flavor_text: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.

name: Tethmos High Priest
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tethmos High Priest, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Death is tyranny. Like all tyranny, it must be opposed."

name: Thermo-Alchemist

Defender
{T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.
flavor_text: "Madness can't touch a mind ignited by genius."

name: Think Twice
oracle_text:
Draw a card.
Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: "Either I know just the spell I need, or I'm about to."

name: Turn to Mist
oracle_text: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

oracle_text: Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"Children, where are your parents?"
—Reig, wandering monk, last words

Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you gain 2 life.
